name: BGRK: Valentine Edition
description:
New rules for old games! The Board Game Remix Kit is a collection of tips, tweaks, reimaginings and completely new games that you can play with the board and pieces from games you might already own: Monopoly, Cluedo, Scrabble and Trivial Pursuit. 

This Valentine's Day expansion adds four more games to play:

  • WLTM Humpty Dumpty, a fill-in-the-blanks dating profile game using Trivial Pursuit cards
  • Divorce!, an honestly kinda complicated game played on the Monopoly board in which you and your opponent woo each other, wed, accrue as much property as possible and then split it acrimoniously
  • ROFDLT, an actual two-player sex game using Scrabble tiles: to be honest we have no idea if anyone's ever played this one, or how well it works, it's not like we were gonna playteset it in the office
  • I Brought You This Piping To Show You My Love, a chase game played on the Cluedo board: race your opponents to the perfect proposal

The Board Game Remix Kit was originally released in 2010 by the company Hide&Seek (which closed in 2014), with this expansion following in February 2011. We are releasing it here as a pdf under a CC-BY-SA license.
